For more information, see the [Tasmota NeoPool documentation]({docs_url}).

yaml_migration.title: YAML Package Migration
yaml_migration.description:
Are you migrating from the YAML package configuration?

Check this box if you're currently using the `ha_neopool_mqtt_package.yaml` file.

yaml_topic.title: MQTT Topic
yaml_topic.description:
Could not auto-detect your NeoPool device.

Please enter the MQTT topic configured in your Tasmota device.

yaml_prefix.title: Custom Entity Prefix
yaml_prefix.description:
No entities found with the default prefix `neopool_mqtt_`.

If you customized the `unique_id` prefix in your YAML package, enter it below.

yaml_confirm.title: Confirm Migration
yaml_confirm.description:
## Migration Summary

The following has been validated:

✓ **MQTT Topic**: `{topic}`
✓ **NodeID**: `{nodeid}`
✓ **Orphaned entities found**: {entity_count}

### Entities to migrate:
{entity_list}

---

## What will happen:

1. Each entity's `unique_id` will be updated to include the NodeID
2. Entities will be associated with this integration
3. **All historical data will be preserved** (graphs, statistics)
4. Entity IDs will remain unchanged

---

⚠️ **Prerequisites** (confirm before proceeding):
- I have removed/commented out the YAML package from `configuration.yaml`
- I have restarted Home Assistant after removing the YAML package
- I understand this process will modify my entity registry

**This action cannot be undone automatically.** By checking the box below, you confirm you have completed the prerequisites and accept responsibility for this migration.

data.confirm_migration: I confirm I have completed the prerequisites and want to proceed
